channel.title: Magic training without gaining hitpoints exp
channel.description: after level 30 magic, u can't curse chickens with full iron on without it actually cursing, so you can only cast it once per chicken, and it ends up taking a long time. is there any way i can curse something after level 30 without it hitting them? which monster or what must i wear. i currently wear full iron + water staff

item.title: Magic training without gaining hitpoints exp
item.dc:creator: @Ca1lum Ca1lum
item.description:
@Ca1lum wrote:

Low Alch… Or if that is to much go to lessor cage in lambrigde in the most -mage bonus gear and it should fail alot more often than on Chickens

Read full topic
item.source: Magic training without gaining hitpoints exp

item.title: Magic training without gaining hitpoints exp
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

buy water runes, dont use staff, and mage in varrock sewers thats how i got my mage to 55 without getting hp.

Read full topic

item.title: Magic training without gaining hitpoints exp
item.dc:creator: @ryanz321 ryanz321
item.description:
@ryanz321 wrote:

go to varrock castle under the stairs monk of zamarok cause it has robes mages defence just where full iron im 30 mage an i dont hit it

item.title: Magic training without gaining hitpoints exp
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

Wear stronghold of security boots, iron kite and green vambs. I was failing every time at 65 magic.

Read full topic
